name: Armor Clash VR
description: Armor Clash VR is an RTS game of modern warfare. In the virtual reality environment, you can build a base, command units above the sky. You will find it is also fun to play an RTS game in VR.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 3.3 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 7 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7-4770 3.4 GHz Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 7 GB available space
